overview: Angelique (Teri Weigel) is a well-known artist who has it allâ€”brains, beauty and success. Her art is unique, provocative and sexy with an artistic flair. The only thing missing is love. Her art is fulfilling but her urge to become whole is ravenous. As she realizes her missing link the answer to her desires becomes evident ... and it was right in front of her the whole time. Be careful what you wish for ... you just might get it!
title: Angelique
